long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Semaforo is a tool designed to help you against Phishing Attacks!

Just download the extension, pin it, and see how it works against the most visited sites

Privacy policy: https://s.semaforo.tech/semaforo_privacy_policy.txt

Check out https://semaforo.tech
long.es:
Semaforo is a tool designed to further reduce the impact of phishing in the context of a modern enterprise. Semaforo mission is to allow your users to easily recognize a corporate sanctioned website against a malicious one, reducing the exposure of users to phishing attacks.
Check out https://semaforo.tech
Check out privacy policy here: https://www.semaforo.tech/privacy-policy/
